attributes.action: Give all immigrant frontline health workers British citizenship.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people did this with pure heart of helping the British citizenry sacrificing their own and their families future. Some paying the ultimate sacrifice.
Granting the British citizenship may not fully compensate for some but it will set hearts at peace both for the lives they helped to save and the families some have have left behind.
attributes.background: Give all foreign frontline health workers British citizenship considering the sacrifices they have made with several paying the ultimate price and their families being left with very little or no long term help. They  will have to spend big chunk of their income to renew their visas.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565015

You may also wish to sign this petition:
